content: > the written instructions for this scarf ** are available for free on my blog 1 ** the downloadable pattern listed here for sale includes written instructions and a handy chart with x s indicating the front post extended stitches for easy reference **facebook group** i have a facebook group where i provide support for all my patterns - join the group 2 **about the pattern** i made a tunisian mosaic crochet triangle shawl and it s incredibly easy it s just an 8-row repeat and it s one of my early patterns but you know what it turned out beautifully and i absolutely adore wearing it the yarn i used is so warm and delightful to work with you can finish it either when you run out of yarn or reach the size you want the soft colors and the pattern complement each other perfectly but the best part is that you can switch out the mosaic pattern for any design you prefer **skill level** easy - the pattern expects basic knowledge of starting and ending a tunisian crochet project and how to make the two stitches used in tunisian mosaic crochet **sharing on social media** if you decide to share your projects on social media i would love to see them please tag your posts with ** @knitterknotter 5 #knitterknotter 6 #madewithknitterknotter 7 ** **blog** you can find all my patterns on my blog here https //knitterknotter com/patterns/ please do not copy or redistribute this pattern you may sell finished items but please credit the pattern to me arunima goel @ knitterknotter i will be happy to see your finished product s join my facebook group to share pictures of your work and to get any help you might need https //www facebook com/groups/knitterknotterhangout/ you can follow me on my blog to get updates on new patterns https //knitterknotter com **discounts** you can always find the following discounts in my shop buy 2 patterns and get 10% off add 2 patterns to your cart buy 3 patterns and get 15% off add 3 patterns to your cart buy 4 patterns and get 1 pattern of value up to $5 free add 5 patterns to your cart and the one with the lowest price will be free > this is a pattern only and not a completed item 1 https //knitterknotter com/easy-tunisian-mosaic-crochet-triangle-shawl-free-pattern/ 2 https //www facebook com/groups/knitterknotterhangout/ 3 https //knitterknotter com/tunisian-crochet-tutorial-tunisian-knit-stitch/ 4 https //knitterknotter com/tunisian-crochet-tutorial-reverse-stitch-trs/ 5 https //www instagram com/knitterknotter/ 6 https //www instagram com/explore/tags/knitterknotter/ 7 https //www instagram com/explore/tags/madewithknitterknotter/
